k23b.ac.db.dao

Class UserDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • k23b.ac.db.dao.UserDao
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UserDaoFactory

    public class UserDao
extends Object
    The Data Access Object class for the manipulation of the Users Table and the retrieval of information from it
